You might be missing the shell environment variables:

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64"
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda

These are used during runtime (versus compile time) cuda shared library lookup.

body:
You might be missing the [shell environment variables](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.7/get_started/os_setup.html#test-the-tensorflow-installation):

```
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64"
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
```

These are used during runtime (versus compile time) cuda shared library lookup.
